name: zastro-websockets
description: Use WebSockets in your Astro SSR Apps - Monorepo containing Node.js and Cloudflare adapters
author: Zach Handley

scripts.build: pnpm run build:upstream && pnpm run build:adapters
scripts.build:upstream: cd astro-upstream && pnpm install && pnpm run build --filter="!@astrojs/node" --filter="!@astrojs/cloudflare"
scripts.test:node: cd ./tests/projects/node && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.test:cloudflare: cd ./tests/projects/cloudflare && pnpm install && pnpm run build && cd ../../..
scripts.test: pnpm run test:node && pnpm run test:cloudflare
scripts.publish:packages: (cd packages/node && npm publish --access public) && (cd packages/cloudflare && npm publish --access public)
